title: Relocated Latham Walmart Opens for Shoppers
text:
Relocated store located at 800 Loudon Road Latham Walmart creates approximately 150 new jobs Store open 7 a.m. to midnight Local Facebook page: www.facebook.com/walmart1997 
LATHAM, N.Y., July 8, 2015 - The relocated Latham Walmart is opening Wednesday, July 15, following a brief ribbon-cutting ceremony at 7 a.m. The relocated store is conveniently located at 800 Loudon Road and is open from 7 a.m. to midnight, seven days a week. The store will provide Latham residents with low prices on a broad assortment of groceries and merchandise, along with a full service pharmacy. Walmart is making shopping more convenient than ever as local residents can shop for more than a million additional items online on Walmart.com and pick them up at the new Latham Walmart store for free, often as quickly as the same day. 
The new store employs approximately 350 full- and part-time associates. Store manager Juan Rivera began his Walmart career in 2001 as an hourly asset protection associate. 
"I'm excited to bring residents this newly relocated store, where they will enjoy the convenience and variety they have come to appreciate from the Latham Walmart, now with fresh produce and meat, and other new features," Rivera said. 
Fresh, Affordable Produce, Meat and Groceries Latham customers will find meal and entertaining essentials, fresh produce and a full line of groceries from leading brand names, including organic selections. By working with growers, Walmart is able to provide farm-grown quality produce at added convenience and low prices. There is also a wide variety of meat and bakery selections, including fresh baked breads and tortillas. Convenient Local Pharmacy and General Merchandise In addition to groceries, the store features quality, value-priced general merchandise, including electronics, furniture, home decor, automotive, sporting goods, home improvement and more. 
The pharmacy offers a full range of products and services. Pharmacy team members are ready to assist customers with product and prescription questions. Latham residents can easily transfer prescriptions and order refills on the go with the Walmart mobile app for iPhone and Android. 
A Big Family Welcome Walmart is happy to be part of the Latham community and is ready to celebrate with residents on Saturday, July 18. A Big Family Welcome will give customers a chance to meet Rivera and enjoy fun family activities and free food samples while supplies last. Join the celebration from 11 a.m. to 3 p.m. 
About Walmart Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. (NYSE: WMT) helps people around the world save money and live better - anytime and anywhere -- in retail stores, online, and through their mobile devices. Each week, more than 250 million customers and members visit our 11,202 stores under 71 banners in 27 countries and e-commerce websites in 11 countries.
